summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1395, for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15253 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
